Class TeacherAttendanceSummaryCenterPanel

java.lang.Object
ticktocktrack.gui.TeacherAttendanceSummaryCenterPanel
public class TeacherAttendanceSummaryCenterPanel extends Object
This class provides the user interface panel for displaying a teacher's attendance summary. It includes styled components such as subject icons, background images, and color-coded attendance cards. This panel allows teachers to view summarized attendance data related to their assigned subjects.

    TeacherAttendanceSummaryCenterPanel.AttendanceRecord
    Represents an attendance record summary for a student.

  • Method Details

    • createPanel

      public static javafx.scene.layout.Pane createPanel(int teacherId)
      Creates and returns the attendance summary panel for the specified teacher.
      Parameters:
      teacherId - the unique identifier of the teacher whose attendance summary is to be displayed
      Returns:
      a Pane containing the teacher's attendance summary UI components

    • buildHeader

      private static javafx.scene.layout.Pane buildHeader()
      Builds and returns the header pane for the attendance summary panel. The header includes a shadow image and a title text styled appropriately.
      Returns:
      a Pane representing the header section with shadow and title

    • buildSubjectGrid

      private static javafx.scene.layout.Pane buildSubjectGrid(javafx.scene.layout.StackPane content, int teacherId)
      Builds the grid layout pane that displays the subjects and related attendance information for the given teacher.
      Parameters:
      content - the StackPane container in which the subject grid will be placed
      teacherId - the ID of the teacher whose subjects' attendance data will be shown
      Returns:
      a Pane representing the grid of subjects with attendance summary cards

    • createSubjectCard

      private static javafx.scene.layout.VBox createSubjectCard(String name, int idx, javafx.scene.layout.StackPane content, int teacherId)
      Creates a visual card representing a subject with attendance summary details. Each card displays the subject name, uses a color from a predefined palette, and integrates with the main content pane for interaction.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the subject to display on the card
      idx - the index of the subject used to select the card's color from a palette
      content - the StackPane where the card can add interactive elements or overlays
      teacherId - the ID of the teacher to retrieve related attendance data
      Returns:
      a VBox representing the styled subject card UI component

    • showDetailView

      private static void showDetailView(String subjectName, javafx.scene.layout.StackPane content, int teacherId)
      Displays a detailed attendance view for the specified subject within the provided content pane. This method fetches attendance data related to the subject and teacher, then populates the content pane with detailed information and visuals.
      Parameters:
      subjectName - the name of the subject to display detailed attendance for
      content - the StackPane where the detailed view will be shown
      teacherId - the ID of the teacher whose attendance data is being viewed

    • createAttendanceTable

      private static javafx.scene.control.TableView<TeacherAttendanceSummaryCenterPanel.AttendanceRecord> createAttendanceTable()
      Creates and configures a TableView for displaying attendance records. The table includes columns such as date, status, and any other relevant attendance information.
      Returns:
      a TableView configured to display AttendanceRecord objects
